trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting?displayProperty=fullName> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting?displayProperty=fullName>附加事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> attached event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste, but before the data is actually pasted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>附加的事件在粘贴操作已选定要粘贴的数据格式之前发生实际粘贴数据。</xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>

trans-unit.source: Actions typically performed by a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> attached event handler include: - Change the selected paste format by setting new value for the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通常由执行的操作<xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>附加的事件处理程序包括:-通过设置新值来更改所选的粘贴格式<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>

trans-unit.source: - Apply a custom data format to the paste selection.
trans-unit.target: -将应用于粘贴选项的自定义数据格式。

trans-unit.source: - Create a new <xref:System.Windows.DataObject>, and assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.DataObject%2A> property of `e`.
trans-unit.target: -创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.DataObject>，并将其分配给<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.DataObject%2A>属性`e`。</xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.DataObject%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: A read-only copy of the original data object is stored in <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 原始的数据对象的只读副本存储在<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cancel the paste operation by calling <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CancelCommand%2A>.
**Important** If the paste format is changed, the handler method is responsible for ensuring that a newly selected paste format is consumable by the paste target.
trans-unit.target: **重要**如果粘贴格式更改，则处理程序方法是负责确保新选择的粘贴格式使用粘贴目标。
